plot: Based upon an Aesop fable, this simple story tells the tale of two mice with different lifestyles, suggesting that it is far better to live simply and in peace than to live in luxury amidst danger.
title: The Town Mouse and the Country Mouse
plot_es: Based upon an Aesop fable, this simple story tells the tale of two mice with different lifestyles, suggesting that it is far better to live simply and in peace than to live in luxury amidst danger.
original_name: The Town Mouse and the Country Mouse
plot_en: Based upon an Aesop fable, this simple story tells the tale of two mice with different lifestyles, suggesting that it is far better to live simply and in peace than to live in luxury amidst danger.
